summary: New island with a large home you can take for yourself.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Description[/size][/b]

If you wanted to own a island then this mod is for you. Charge is 30 miles from Skyrim's coast and is accessible from any major dock, optionally there is a spell to teleport there. Complete a few quests and you will have the key to a mansion. Control the surrounding settlement and defend it from bandits.

[b]Features[/b]:

-2 companions (1 animal 1 human)

[b][size=4]Compatibility & Install

[/size][/b]It isn't filled with dirty or wild edits so unless a terrain mod overwrites the port there shouldn't be any issues. Report any incompatibilities you find in the comments.

Just install normally! DLC isn't needed.
author: Ajeet
